sentences.sContent: They were all there except me.
sentences.sCn: 除了我以外他们都在那里。

sentences.sContent: They all howled with laughter except me.
sentences.sCn: 除了我以外，他们全都哈哈大笑起来。

sentences.sContent: I have earrings just like those, except they’re blue. ＃
sentences.sCn: 我有一对耳环跟那一对很像，只是我的是蓝色的。

words.tran: 可反对的；可抗议的；引起反感的

remMethod.val: ex(出) + cept(拿， 抓) → 不拿 → 将…除外

trans.tranOther: used to introduce the only person, thing, action, fact, or situation about which a statement is not true
used to mention a fact that makes what you have just said seem less true
